name: Amnesia Later x Crowd for Nintendo Switch
storyline: There’s “New World” which is like another story to the original story where the heroine still has no memories. The After Story takes place after she regains her memories in the original game and then there’s other bonuses like Waka World and Girls Party. Additionally you get a chance to reflect on your past journey with Orion.
summary: Nintendo Switch port of the games Amnesia Later and Amnesia Crowd.
